title: placement bug?
body: uhm so i did my 10 placements got bronze 3 then ive played about another 15 games gaining Lp etc then i played 1 game today said i finished my Placements again and put me in Bronze V. is this normal or a bug>?

replies.body: It fucken happened to me again today, i was in my placements, i finished them ages ago i was placed in b3 then my stuff was reset again and then i was put in b1 and i was climbing to silver promos when i got on today and it says im in my Fucking placements again, riot come on please fix this its a major bug!!!
It isn't a bug this time, today is the start of Season 7 of ranked.

apperently it was a mistake in the matchmaking system so riot reset it to the next 1 game you play kind of stupid because after i done my placement won 3 out of 10 i went on a 8 winning streak only to be put down to bronze 5 after 1 loss feel kind of cheated

Updates in this thread here, it's a known ongoing issue:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/u2iR6nTU-ranked-flex-match-making-issues-update
Same happened to me. Got silver 4, climbed to silver 2, 99lp, won a game and back to silver 4 again.
